alert.note: Alert for Dixon Entrance to Cape Decision Coastal Area (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 08 at 10:50PM AKST until January 09 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 5 to 9 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Western Prince of Wales Island. * WHEN...Until 6 AM AKST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches and cause power outages. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Around 5 inches of snow was measured in Craig, followed by freezing rain and a change to all rain in the early evening. Snow amounts will continue and be highest in the higher terrain of the road system and in northern communities. A change to all rain is expected early Sunday with a chance of freezing rain before the change over.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.

area.areaDesc: Dixon Entrance to Cape Decision Coastal Area
